content: materials & details yarn hand towel - 150 yards cotton little scrubbies - 30 yards cotton crochet hook i miscellaneous yarn needle ⅞ -1 button or similar sewing needle and matching thread pins stitch marker gauge not needed for this project but provided for comparison 4 with an i hook = 18 row single_crochet in blo 15 single_crochet sts in blo finished measurements hanging towel - 13 5 long not including handle x 7 wide when folded x 14 wide bottom edge unfolded scrubbie 5 x 6
